sources.jscripts/logics/battle.js:
import {player} from "../components/player.js"
import pubsub from "../components/pubsub.js"
import * as f from "../components/functions.js"
import {enemyBoxes} from "../components/dom.js"

export function battleInit() {
  f.battlefunctions.initEnemies()
  f.cardfunctions.resetDrawPile()



  f.renderHealth(player)
// after everything is initialized start turn
  pubsub.turnStarted()


}
